text: Maaŋ muuŋgiap, harigi ŋguir kaa ga vhov buni nzuai ne, ne Fhe Bakɨme won ŋkasŋka ndi khɨvi bigeŋ ma. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, ana won ŋkasŋkar mba guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, ana mbe khɨvi bigeŋ fhuvara. Ana wo ŋkasŋkar mba ana khothɨgi fhuv gumgi gu mbigi khɨvi bigeŋ ma. Ana mbe ana khothɨgi fhuv tɨva ndi hiaŋ rɨgi bigeŋ ma. Fhe Bakɨme wo buni vhuuiŋ ndi ndɨɨim nta bun nzuai, ne khaŋ muuŋgi. Mba guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, ana mba ŋkasŋkar mbe nɨɨŋgi. Mba guigira Zisas khothɨgi fhuv ntɨɨri, mbe fhuvara.
